data.name: Coloree Demo
data.detailed_description:
Can you recognize the abstract models from the picture and match colours by moving them around in a geometric space? Playing with colours sounds easy, but we have something different that will give you a fun challenge!

Coloree is a very simple but deceptively challenging relaxing and minimalistic puzzle game about moving colours to match each level’s picture. Simple yet powerful it will give you many relaxing and challenging hours, and satisfaction with each completed level.

Key features:

  • 9 challenging levels (80 in full version)
  • Different levels involving a different approach each time
  • Relaxing atmosphere
  • Different picture at each level, will make you wonder what’s next?
  • Colours, lot's of colours

Try it out!
